Blind fear/Nightstrke

Blindfear came back to Decepticon's base and he heard the battle 
between Unitron and  Megatron. He ran in order to help megatron, 
Nightstrike aimed his weapon against Unitron "You have to command it, 
my lord" said Nightrike to Megatron "And this bot will go to pit"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> The blade digs into Megatron's abdomen, as he begins to leak oil. 
His
> eyes narrow, and his lip curls up in pain, as he begins to squeeze
> Unitron's wrist with all his might, and uses his free arm to grab
> Unitrons hand, that was holding the blade.
